name: verse-auto-imports
description: Automatically adds missing using statements in Verse files

verseAutoImports.autoImport.description: Automatically add missing imports when errors are detected

verseAutoImports.diagnosticDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before processing diagnostics to reduce frequency of updates

verseAutoImports.importSyntax.description: Preferred import syntax: 'curly' for 'using { /Path }' or 'dot' for 'using. /Path'

verseAutoImports.preserveImportLocations.description: When true, keeps existing imports where they are and only adds new imports at the top. When false, consolidates all imports at the top of the file.

verseAutoImports.ambiguousImports.description: Mappings for class names that appear in multiple modules. Format: {"className": "preferredModulePath"}

verseAutoImports.multiOptionStrategy.description: How to handle multiple import options: 'quickfix' shows options in quick fix menu, 'auto_shortest' automatically selects shortest path, 'auto_first' selects first option, 'disabled' ignores multi-option scenarios

verseAutoImports.useDigestFiles.description: Enable lookup of unknown identifiers in Verse digest files for intelligent import suggestions (experimental)

verseAutoImports.unknownIdentifierResolu.description: Strategy for resolving unknown identifiers: 'digest_only' uses only digest files, 'digest_and_inference' adds pattern-based guessing, 'disabled' turns off unknown identifier resolution

verseAutoImports.quickFixOrdering.description: How to order multiple quick fix options: 'confidence' by suggestion confidence, 'alphabetical' by import statement, 'module_priority' by configured module priorities

verseAutoImports.showQuickFixDescription.description: Show descriptive text in quick fix menu items (e.g., 'class from /Fortnite.com/Devices')
